import React, {useState} from 'react' import { ProductTable, Total, Container } from './style' import {MdRemoveCircleOutline, MdAddCircleOutline, MdDelete} from 'react-icons/md' import {connect} from 'react-redux' function Cart (){ const [cart, setCart ] = useState() return ( PRODUTO QTD SUBTOTAL {cart.map(product => ( {product.title} {product.priceFormated}
R$ 258,80 ))}
Total R$ 1920,80
) } export default Cart
